hero.title: Products & Services
hero.subtitle: We provide services and developer tools for emotion interfaces.

sumDiary.title: Sum Diary
sumDiary.description: A smart diary service where AI analyzes and understands your emotions. Record your daily feelings and receive empathetic interpretations from AI. Discover emotional patterns and deepen self-understanding.

huaUx.name: @hua-labs/hua-ux
huaUx.title: HUA UX Framework
huaUx.description: A React framework with pre-connected UI + Motion + i18n. Build beautiful UX quickly.

ui.name: @hua-labs/ui
ui.title: HUA UI
ui.description: Beautiful and accessible React component library. Built on Tailwind CSS.

motion.name: @hua-labs/motion-core
motion.title: Motion Core
motion.description: Declarative React animation hooks. Implement rich motion with a simple API.

i18n.name: @hua-labs/i18n-core
i18n.title: i18n Core
i18n.description: Multilingual system supporting both SSR/CSR. Integrated with Zustand for state management.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Create better user experiences with HUA Labs products and packages.
